thread.section_title: Caravel Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: First time in Rome
thread.title_full: First time in Rome - Review of Caravel Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: MeganMRichardson
title: First time in Rome
text: A great hotel! The room we had was so spacious and spotless. The staff we're really friendly and helpful! I also liked the different things you could have for breakfast, which tasted so good! Although we only had 2 English channels on our TV we weren't really bothered, as we we're always out seeing the different sights. I would really recommend the hotel to anyone who is thinking of going Rome and I would defiantly stay here again.
